item.title: Game Changer: Telangana government approves ticket rate hikes - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer: Telangana government approves ticket rate hikes

Published on: Jan 8, 2025 10:55 pm IST

The Telangana government has approved ticket rate hikes for the film 'Game Changer,' allowing increased prices following discussions post a recent theater incident.

  • The government approved a hike of Rs. 150 in multiplexes and Rs. 100 in single screens starting January 10.
  • Ticket fare on opening day will be Rs. 400 for multiplexes and Rs. 250 for single screens.
  • From the second day, the hike limits are Rs. 100 in multiplexes and Rs. 50 in single screens, lasting for ten days.
  • Preparation for six shows on opening day, reducing to five shows thereafter.
  • Dil Raju’s Sri Venkateswara Creations produced the film, directed by Shankar.
“If the content is good, ‘Game Changer’ will have a superb long run at the Nizam box office.”

This strategic pricing is designed to attract more viewers without significant increases in ticket costs, balancing the interests of the cinema industry and moviegoers.

item.title: Salim Khan Says Salman Khan Wants Wife To Give Up Career, Stay Home: 'Convert Karne Ki Koshish...' | Viral - News18
item.description:
Salim Khan Says Salman Khan Wants Wife To Give Up Career, Stay Home: 'Convert Karne Ki Koshish...'

Date: January 08, 2025 | Source: News

Salim Khan, father of Bollywood star Salman Khan, sheds light on his son’s reluctance to marry, suggesting that Salman tends to seek maternal qualities in his partners, which complicates his relationships with career-oriented women.

  • Salman Khan remains unmarried despite being in high-profile relationships.
  • Salim Khan describes a contradiction in Salman’s beliefs about marriage.
  • He suggests that Salman tries to 'convert' his partners into a motherly figure.
  • Salim emphasizes the absurdity of expecting career-driven women to abandon their ambitions.
  • A recent clip of this discussion has gained traction on social media.
  • Salman is slated to appear in the upcoming project 'Sikandar' with Rashmika Mandanna.
“Jab commitment ho jaata hai toh voh usko convert karne ki koshish karta hai, usme apni maa dhoondta hai. Voh toh possible nahi hai.” - Salim Khan

This commentary from Salim Khan offers a glimpse into the complexities of Salman Khan's relationships and societal expectations surrounding marriage and careers.

item.title: Writer-filmmaker Pritish Nandy passes away at 73; Heartbroken Anupam Kher shares emotional post - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Writer-filmmaker Pritish Nandy passes away at 73; Heartbroken Anupam Kher shares emotional post

Date: [Publication Date] | Source: [Source]

Pritish Nandy, a notable writer and filmmaker, has passed away at the age of 73. Anupam Kher expresses his sorrow through an emotional post recognizing Nandy's contributions to cinema and writing.

  • Pritish Nandy was a celebrated figure in both literature and film in India.
  • His passing has prompted an outpouring of condolences and tributes on social media.
  • Anupam Kher shared heartfelt memories of their friendship and Nandy's influence on his life.
“He was a true inspiration and a guiding light for many in the industry.”

This tragic loss has not only affected his friends and family but also the larger community of artists and audiences who admired his work.

item.title: Bigg Boss 18: Eisha Singh Sees This Contestant In Finale And It Is Not Vivian Dsena Or Avinash Mishra - News18
item.description:
Bigg Boss 18: Eisha Singh Sees This Contestant In Finale And It Is Not Vivian Dsena Or Avinash Mishra

Date: January 08, 2025

Source: News18

The Bigg Boss 18 reality show, hosted by Salman Khan, is gearing up for its grand finale on January 19. Eisha Singh has shared her prediction of which contestant she expects to see in the finale, excluding notable contestants Avinash Mishra and Vivian Dsena.

  • The remaining contestants are Karan Veer Mehra, Vivian Dsena, Avinash Mishra, Eisha Singh, Rajat Dalal, Shrutika Arjun, Chahat Pandey, Chum Darang, and Shilpa Shirodkar.
  • Eisha Singh revealed this during a competitive nomination task where she interacted with Karan Veer Mehra.
  • Controversies and tensions are rising among contestants as they vie for a spot in the finale.
Eisha Singh commented, “Tum (You)” when asked who she sees next to her in the finale.

Fans are eagerly awaiting to see who will ultimately win Bigg Boss 18 as the finale approaches.

item.title: 'Baby John flopped as audience had already seen Theri', says Rajpal Yadav, reveals how Varun Dhawan took the failure - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Rajpal Yadav Discusses Baby John's Box Office Failure and Varun Dhawan's Reaction

Date: Jan 08, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Rajpal Yadav has opened up about the box office failure of his film Baby John and shared how lead actor Varun Dhawan reacted to the disappointing outcome.

  • Baby John, directed by Kalees, was produced with a budget over ₹180 crore but earned less than ₹50 crore.
  • The film is a remake of the Tamil film Theri, which may have affected its performance at the box office.
  • Rajpal criticizes the remake aspect, stating if it were not a remake, it could have been one of his best films.
  • Despite the failure, Rajpal praises Varun for his hard work and risk-taking attitude in cinema.
  • Rajpal portrayed Constable Ram Sevak, a supporting character to Varun's DCP Satya Verma.
“Varun is such a sweet boy, very hardworking... his attempts must be appreciated because it’s a big deal to take risks.”

The film's failure highlights the challenges of remakes in Bollywood, as audiences often compare them to their originals.

item.title: '99% of the credit goes to Randeep Hooda,' says Jay Patel as Swatantrya Veer Savarkar becomes India’s Osc - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Jay Patel Credits Randeep Hooda as Savarkar Becomes India’s Entry for Oscar 2025

Publication Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

This article discusses the selection of 'Swatantrya Veer Savarkar' as India’s official entry for the Oscars in 2025 and highlights Jay Patel's words praising Randeep Hooda’s contribution to the film.

  • 'Swatantrya Veer Savarkar' has been chosen as India’s Oscar entry for 2025.
  • Jay Patel emphasized that 99% of the film's success is due to Randeep Hooda.
  • The film has generated buzz for its portrayal of a significant historical figure.
“99% of the credit goes to Randeep Hooda,” said Jay Patel, expressing gratitude for the actor's commitment to the project.

The film is expected to not only highlight Indian cinema but also bring awareness to an important historical narrative on a global stage.

item.title: Song Joong Ki's ‘Bogota looks super boring': All eyes on K-drama comeback in 2025 amid ‘dull’ box office patch - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Song Joong Ki's ‘Bogota looks super boring': All eyes on K-drama comeback in 2025 amid ‘dull’ box office patch

Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Despite his success, Song Joong Ki faces box office challenges with his recent film Bogota struggling to attract audiences, while anticipation builds for his K-drama return in 2025.

  • Song Joong Ki made a cameo in the upcoming Queen of Tears
  • His recent films Hopeless and Bogota performed poorly at the box office
  • Recent audience numbers for Bogota show only 336,348 views so far
  • Online debates emerge regarding his diminishing film appeal compared to K-dramas
  • Anticipation grows for his K-drama comeback in My Youth, set to release soon
“People in Korea have higher standards now – it’s no longer an era where people watch movies just because a certain actor is in it.”

In conclusion, while Song Joong Ki faces scrutiny over his recent film choices, fans remain hopeful for a successful return to K-dramas with upcoming projects that highlight his talents in more beloved formats.

item.title: Bellamkonda Sreenivas’ next is titled Haindava Solid glimpse raises expectations - 123telugu
item.description:
Bellamkonda Sreenivas’ Next Film, Haindava, Generates Excitement with First Glimpse

Published on: Jan 8, 2025 8:00 pm IST

The newly announced film, titled Haindava, featuring young actors Bellamkonda Sreenivas and Samyuktha Menon, showcases a high-budget thriller that combines divinity and adventure, captivating the audience’s curiosity.

  • The glimpse video of Haindava was recently unveiled, highlighting elements of both thrill and spirituality.
  • It features Sreenivas making a dramatic entry in a jungle setting while saving a sacred temple from miscreants.
  • The film promises an epic narrative intertwined with themes of Hindu mythology, aiming for a pan-Indian release.
  • Debut director Ludheer Byreddy helms this project, with Mahesh Chandu producing under the Moonshine Pictures banner and music by Leon James.
The glimpse of Haindava assures warmth among audiences with its unique blend of themes.

This grand adventure is expected to strike a chord with audiences across the nation, leading to an anticipated warm reception.

item.title: Kangana Ranaut requested Priyanka Gandhi to watch ‘Emergency’; here’s how she replied - The Indian Express
item.description:
Kangana Ranaut Invites Priyanka Gandhi to Watch 'Emergency'

Publication Date: January 8, 2025 | Source: Indian Express

Bollywood actor-director Kangana Ranaut has requested Congress MP Priyanka Gandhi Vadra to watch her latest film, 'Emergency', which depicts events during Indira Gandhi's time as Prime Minister.

  • Kangana Ranaut met Priyanka Gandhi in Parliament, where Priyanka complimented her work.
  • Ranaut invited Priyanka to watch 'Emergency', to which she replied, “okay, maybe.”
  • The film documents the 21 months of Emergency imposed in 1975 by Indira Gandhi.
  • 'Emergency' is set to be released on January 17, after receiving a censor certificate amidst controversy.
  • The film features Anupam Kher, Shreyas Talpade, Milind Soman, Mahima Choudhary, and the late Satish Kaushik.
“If they have a little bit of acceptance for what has been, they would appreciate the film,” said Ranaut.

The upcoming film 'Emergency' aims to provide a narrative surrounding a controversial period in Indian history.

item.title: Triptii Dimri's exit from Aashiqui 3 allegedly due to her bold image in Animal, Kangana Ranaut on censor - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Triptii Dimri Exits Aashiqui 3 Amid Bold Image Concerns and Kangana Ranaut's Censor Board Controversy

Date: October 2023 | Source: Times of India

This article covers the latest news in the entertainment industry, focusing on Triptii Dimri's exit from Aashiqui 3, the reaction of Kangana Ranaut to the censor board's cuts of her film Emergency, and other significant events in Bollywood.

  • Triptii Dimri exits Aashiqui 3, allegedly due to her bold image perceived after her role in Animal.
  • Kangana Ranaut responds to the censor board cutting scenes from her directorial film Emergency, emphasizing the film's respectful portrayal of historical events.
  • A man has been arrested for stealing diamond jewelry and cash from actress Poonam Dhillon's home.
  • Manoj Bajpayee reflects on his bond with late actor Sushant Singh Rajput.
  • Fans express excitement over a potential collaboration between Shah Rukh Khan and his son Aryan Khan after a recent photoshoot.
Kangana Ranaut stated, "The film was not intended to mock anyone... it’s meant to convey historical events with respect."

In conclusion, the entertainment industry is buzzing with news about key developments, reflecting both personal struggles and broader societal issues faced by its stars.

item.title: Exclusive: Shahid Kapoor in advanced talks with Atlee for a Masaledaar Blockbuster! - Bollywood Hungama
item.description:
Shahid Kapoor in Advanced Talks with Atlee for a Masaledaar Blockbuster!

Publication Date: January 20, 2025 Source: Bollywood Hungama

Shahid Kapoor is generating buzz with his recent projects and is now reportedly in talks with director Atlee for a potential blockbuster.

  • Shahid's upcoming film, Deva, is set to release on January 31, 2025.
  • He is also shooting for a gangster role in a thriller slated for late 2025.
  • The new collaboration with Atlee has been in discussion for about five months.
  • The film will be an original action entertainer, distinct from remakes like Baby John.
  • Atlee has crafted the script himself and sees Shahid as a perfect fit for the lead role.
“The team is in advanced stages of discussion and things should fall in place shortly.”

This anticipated collaboration promises to showcase Shahid Kapoor in a larger-than-life role, further enriching his diverse filmography.

item.title: Suriya’s Retro seals its release date with a solid poster - 123telugu
item.description:
Suriya’s Retro seals its release date with a solid poster

Published on Jan 8, 2025, by 123Telugu

Kollywood star Suriya’s Retro: Love Laughter War is one of the most eagerly awaited biggies of this year, set to release on May 1.

  • The film is directed by Karthik Subbaraj and stars Pooja Hegde as the female lead.
  • Suriya wrapped up the film's shoot in a record 3 months.
  • The announcement of the release was made via social media with a fierce poster of Suriya.
  • Retro marks Suriya’s 44th project, featuring Shriya Saran in a special song.
  • Produced by Suriya and Jyothika’s 2D Entertainment, Santhosh Narayanan composes the music.
“The ONE from May ONE,” read the announcement from the makers.

Retro is anticipated to be a high-budget romantic action drama that promises to capture audience attention.

item.title: WWE’s Current Stance on John Cena Winning the Royal Rumble After RAW Netflix Premiere - Ringside News
item.description:
WWE's Current Stance on John Cena Winning the Royal Rumble After RAW Netflix Premiere

Publication Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: Ringside News

John Cena's retirement tour officially kicked off during WWE RAW's debut on Netflix, where he announced his intentions to compete in the Royal Rumble.

  • Cena cut a significant promo during RAW, indicating his aspirations for the upcoming Royal Rumble.
  • WWE is reportedly strongly considering him as a frontrunner to win the event.
  • The crowd's positive reaction to Cena's promo has reinforced his status as WWE's top choice for victory.
  • The Royal Rumble is set for February 1, 2025, at Lucas Oil Stadium, increasing anticipation among fans.
“Yeah, especially after that promo last night, everybody in attendance gave him the reaction he was looking for, and they wanna see #17...”

With Cena's retirement tour underway, fans are hopeful for a celebratory win at the Royal Rumble, which would mark a significant moment in his legacy.

item.title: Game Changer (Hindi) Box Office Preview: Ram Charan, Kiara Advani starrer run time, screen count, advance booking & opening day - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Game Changer (Hindi) Box Office Preview

Published on: January 08, 2025 | Source: Pinkvilla

Game Changer, starring Ram Charan and Kiara Advani, is set to release on January 10, 2025, and is expected to earn between Rs 2.25 crore and Rs 3.00 crore on its opening day.

  • The film is directed by Shankar and features a runtime of 2 hours and 44 minutes.
  • It aims for a wide release on over 2000 screens with a focus on mass belts and single screens.
  • Advance bookings indicate positive momentum with around 1000 tickets sold in major chains as of Wednesday afternoon.
  • The film's success heavily relies on word of mouth and audience turnout.
“A lot for Game Changer in Hindi will depend on the word of mouth, as a positive talk is a must for the film to recover the big investment.”

The anticipation for this film hinges on its content, with high hopes for its performance at the box office.

item.title: Toxic Box Office: Yash’s Comeback To End Sandalwood’s Dull Phase, 100 Crore Opening Guaranteed After 2 Years? - Koimoi
item.description:
Toxic Box Office: Yash’s Comeback To End Sandalwood’s Dull Phase, 100 Crore Opening Guaranteed

Publication Date: N/A | Source: Koimoi

Yash is set to return to the big screen with his upcoming film 'Toxic', which aims to revitalize the Sandalwood box office after a slump. The release is rumored for December 2025 and is anticipated to open with impressive numbers.

  • Yash unveiled the first-look teaser on his 39th birthday, showcasing a new avatar.
  • The film is expected to generate a ₹100 crore opening at the box office.
  • The release strategy is focused on capitalizing on Yash's pan-India popularity post-KGF Chapter 2.
  • In 2022, KGF Chapter 2 opened with ₹116 crore, setting high expectations for 'Toxic'.
"If all goes well, Toxic might hit a century on day 1, thus bringing back the glory of the Kannada film industry."

The film’s success could reinvigorate the Kannada film industry, which faced challenges over the last couple of years.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 34: Profits Bounce Over 300% As Allu Arjun Starrer Continues Its Unstoppable Run! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Hindi Box Office Day 34: Profits Bounce Over 300%

Publication Date: January 2025 | Source: Koimoi

Pushpa 2 continues to dominate the Hindi box office even after 34 days, showcasing remarkable profits and a strategy for renewed viewership with new content.

  • Pushpa 2 has maintained strong box office performance despite rising competition.
  • The film earned an additional 2.10 crores on its 34th day, with a cumulative total of 816.55 crores.
  • A reloaded version of the film is set to release on January 11, 2025, featuring 20 minutes of new content.
  • The production cost in the Hindi market was approximately 200 crores, leading to profits of about 616.55 crores.
  • Pushpa 2's profit percentage is around 308%.
“Pushpa 2 is already the highest-grossing Hindi film in India, being the first to cross the 800 crore club.”

As Pushpa 2 continues its triumphant path at the box office, it establishes a benchmark for future Hindi films, emphasizing the lasting appeal of innovative storytelling and cinematic experiences.

item.title: Here’s why Allu Arjun’s meeting with Sri Tej was low-profile - 123telugu
item.description:
Why Allu Arjun's Meeting with Sri Tej Was Low-Profile

Published on Jan 8, 2025 5:02 pm IST

A tragic incident occurred during the screening of Pushpa 2 in Hyderabad, leading to an unfortunate loss of life. Allu Arjun's recent visit to Sri Tej's hospital was meant to be discreet.

  • A woman lost her life during the screening of Pushpa 2 in Hyderabad.
  • Sri Tej is currently receiving treatment at AIIMS in Hyderabad.
  • Allu Arjun visited Sri Tej in the hospital and a video of this visit went viral.
  • The police instructed Allu Arjun and his team to keep the visit low-profile and not share any details.
  • Allu Arjun was seen leaving the hospital sporting a new look.
“The police have kept everything confidential to prevent further confusion.”

This visit highlighted the sensitive nature of the situation and the discretion required from all parties involved.

item.title: Coolie VS War 2 At Box Office: Makers Killing The Potential Of Rajinikanth & Lokesh Kanagaraj’s Deadly Combo? - Koimoi
item.description:
Coolie VS War 2 At Box Office: Makers Killing The Potential Of Rajinikanth & Lokesh Kanagaraj’s Dea

Publication Date: January 2025

Source: Koimoi

Rajinikanth’s Coolie, directed by Lokesh Kanagaraj, is generating buzz among fans. However, it may face severe competition at the box office from the film War 2, which is already slated for release on August 14, 2025.

  • Rajinikanth's collaboration with Lokesh Kanagaraj is highly anticipated.
  • The film could clash with Hrithik Roshan and Jr NTR's War 2.
  • Potential release date for Coolie is now targeted during the Independence Day weekend, coinciding with War 2.
  • Both films have strong box office potential but could significantly impact each other's performance.
"The clash will kill the potential of the Rajinikanth starrer, and we hope the makers avert the brutal battle."

The outcome of this box office battle could influence the success of both films significantly.

item.title: Mumbai real estate: Varun Dhawan and family buy two luxury apartments in Juhu worth 86.92 crore - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Varun Dhawan Acquires Two Luxury Apartments in Mumbai's Juhu for ₹86.92 Crore

Publication Date: January 3, 2024   |   Source: Hindustan Times

Bollywood actor Varun Dhawan and his family have recently purchased two luxury apartments in Juhu, Mumbai, for a combined total of ₹86.92 crore, marking a significant addition to the actor's real estate portfolio.

  • First apartment acquired for ₹44.52 crore, measuring 5,112 sq ft with four car parking spaces.
  • Second apartment purchased for ₹42.40 crore, measuring 4,617 sq ft, also with four car parking spaces.
  • The transactions were registered on January 3, 2024, with the first apartment priced at over ₹87,000 per sq ft.
  • The construction of the building, named Twenty, is expected to be completed by May 31, 2025.
  • This purchase highlights the growing trend of Bollywood celebrities investing in luxury real estate.
"Bollywood A-lister Varun Dhawan and his wife Natasha Dalal have acquired two flats in TWENTY, an exclusive residential project... valued at ₹86.92 crore, reflecting the pinnacle of luxury and exclusivity," stated D'Decor Exports.

The acquisition of these apartments illustrates the continuing allure of high-end properties in Mumbai's coveted Juhu locality, known for its star-studded residents.
